attributes.review: It took two weeks to download. My credit card info was stolen and someone ordered 500 Trump flags. My bank account was drained 😭. My bank wont let me get the money back either. This app needs to be took down!! I wouldn’t recommend downloading.
attributes.title: Horrible 😭

attributes.review: i wish i could give this 0 stars but this is the lowest it’ll go. as soon as i opened this app my phone completely crashed. i kept on trying to open it but it just made it worse. i had to get a new phone because of this garbage app.
attributes.title: TERRIBLE APP

attributes.review: This app is just plain boring. I honestly don’t know how this app is on the App Store because it’s full of rubbish AND is not helpful at all. Needless to say I’m very very disappointed in this app I don’t even think updates could ever make this app better. It should just be taken down.
attributes.title: Worst app EVER!!

attributes.review: So as soon as I downloaded it an alert popped up saying they smell tamales and assumed i was Mexican...I am anyways they did face ID and realized i’m also half asian and logged me out because it thinks i have the “ chinese virus” even though I’m Filipino...oh and after it realized I was Mexican it called me a rapist and criminal ... weird.
attributes.title: chinese virus 😰

attributes.review: my phone is hacked now i think!! it keeps randomly turning on and off and my sound isn’t working!! but i can’t afford to buy a new phone because i’m spending all my money on my college degree and healthcare🙂 but still trump 2020!!!! but get this fixed i’m scared for my life!!!!!!!!
attributes.title: virus!!! DO NOT DOWNLOAD

attributes.review: This app literally gave me a severe gastrointestinal disease as well as coronavirus. I could feel Donald’s racism through the phone (and melania and Barron’s sadness) and it made me extremely depressed and anxious. I am disgusted by the Apple store for continuing to have this app even listed. It is a public health HAZARD. 10/10 would NOT recommend.
attributes.title: Disgusting app

attributes.review: This app is a disgrace to the Country. After dowloading it, I notice I have a virus spreading i inside of my phone. For exaclty 27MINUTES my phone was acting unusual and kept turning off and glitching. For people reading my honest review I advise you to take precautions of your phone and STAY AWAY FROM THIS MONSTROUS APP for the bettef working of your phone or tablet. Good Day.
attributes.title: HORIFFIC APP

attributes.review: After I downloaded this app my microwave started leaking radiation. It got to the point that my cat grew an extra limb and started spewing nonsense about a second coming..? Anyways this app single-handedly started the rapture in my own household and my owning this app has damned me to eternal punishment. At least let me keep TikTok.
attributes.title: Don’t ❤️✨🧚‍♂️

attributes.review: This app is HORRIBLE, I just wanted to support king trump and his app but when I put in my email and phone number to receive campaign updates I started getting emails all over the country (specifically China and Russia). Why did all my info go to these people?
attributes.title: Literally stole all my info

attributes.review: This app just has a bunch of glitches and the platform is very unhelpful. I have a hard time viewing updates and it’s usually super slow to load. It’s also not as exclusive as I thought it was. Super disappointed. DONT GET THIS APP.
attributes.title: Was excited but then disappointed
